review: it was just an amazing movie. i just could not stop my tears while laughing out loud. as moments pass the comedies of the movie heightens its levels.the sweet and sour relationship of the orphans just like brothers brought wide smile on my face.the story is fantastic and from small children to the senior citizens can watch it sitting together. so what are you waiting for guys? go and watch this wonderful movie.

recently came to know golmaal 3 (2010) is a copy of south movie named "pandavulu pandavulu tummeda (2007)".
all the movies from rohit shetty are eithier copied or remake from tollywood but i assumed golmaal was his own creation but unfortunately it is not. 
not only the story but the dioluges, characters, scenes, scripting every single thing is copied.
i would rather prefer tollywood  then bollywood.
